languages.text: "Хорошо. Если мы когда-нибудь встретимся с Иремерисс — я позволю тебе нанести последний удар".
"Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Если мы когда-нибудь встретимся с Иремерисс — я позволю тебе нанести последний удар".

traits.locale_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."
"Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."
"Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."
"Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

languages.text: “很好，无论什么时候遇到伊芮梅莉斯，我都允许你亲手给她最后一击。”
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: “很好，无论什么时候遇到伊芮梅莉斯，我都允许你亲手给她最后一击。”

languages.text: 「了解。イレメリスと遭遇したならば、トドメを刺すのは必ずやお前に託そう」
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: 「了解。イレメリスと遭遇したならば、トドメを刺すのは必ずやお前に託そう」

languages.text: «Muy bien. Si en algún momento nos topamos con Yremeryss, permitiré que le asestes el golpe de gracia».
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien. Si en algún momento nos topamos con Yremeryss, permitiré que le asestes el golpe de gracia».

languages.text: « Très bien. Si nous sommes amenés à croiser la route d'Yremeryss, je vous laisserai porter le coup de grâce. »
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Si nous sommes amenés à croiser la route d'Yremeryss, je vous laisserai porter le coup de grâce. »

languages.text: "Also gut. Sollten wir irgendwann Yremeryss begegnen, werde ich Euch gestatten, ihr den Todesschlag zu versetzen."
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: "Also gut. Sollten wir irgendwann Yremeryss begegnen, werde ich Euch gestatten, ihr den Todesschlag zu versetzen."

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Bir noktada Yremeryss ile karşılaşırsak son darbeyi indirmene izin vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "Very well. Should we encounter Yremeryss at any point, I shall allow you to deal the final blow."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ. Herhangi bir noktada Yremeryss ile karşılaşırsak son darbeyi indirmene izin vereceğim."
